reviewText: I love the classic movies.  I enjoy the singing and dancing. We already had Penny Serenade, but I wanted the other two, so I was willing to get this three-movie collection.  The Royal Wedding was not quite as clear as the other two picture wise, so maybe the restoration of it could not be improved any more than it was, yet I still thoroughly enjoy watching Fred Astaire dance. He is so lithe, and graceful, and his dancing is the best and most inventive.
